project_name.justification: The documents consistently refer to the project as the Pine Ridge Project, for example: "Acquisition of the Advanced Pine Ridge Uranium Project in Wyoming through strategic partnership with Snow Lake Energy".

company_name.justification: The buyer is identified as "Global Uranium and Enrichment Limited (ASX: GUE, OTCQB: GUELF) (Global Uranium, GUE or the Company)".

ceo_buyer.justification: The Managing Director of the buyer, Global Uranium and Enrichment Ltd, is identified: "Commenting on the acquisition and JV, Mr. Andrew Ferrier, Managing Director of GUE said...".

interest_acquired_percent.justification: Global Uranium and Enrichment Ltd (GUE) is acquiring its interest via a 50/50 joint venture. The JV acquires 100% of the project, making GUE's effective interest 50%. "Powder River Basin LLC (owned 50% by the Usuran Resources Inc, and 50% by Snow Lake Exploration (US) Ltd) (Buyer). Usuran is a wholly owned subsidiary of Global Uranium and Enrichment Limited (Company)".

primary_commodity.justification: The documents describe the transaction as a "Transformational U.S. Uranium Transaction".

verified_article_link.justification: No article URL was provided in the prompt. All provided documents are verified to be about the Pine Ridge project.

currency.justification: The consideration for the acquisition is stated in US dollars: "The consideration payable by Powder River to acquire a 100% interest in Pine Ridge totals US$22.5 million".

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash consideration is US$22,500,000. As a 50% partner in the joint venture, Global Uranium's share is US$11,250,000. "pay the Seller a total of US$22,500,000 cash... As part of the JV, Global Uranium and Snow Lake are each responsible for providing 50% of the Consideration".

share_payments_raw.justification: The consideration for the project acquisition is entirely in cash. No shares were issued to the seller.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Explicit cash payment values were found, so this field is null as per the financial data extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares were issued as part of the consideration to acquire the project from the seller. The placement mentioned is a separate capital raising transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the consideration for the project acquisition.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the consideration for the project acquisition.

issued_share_price.justification: Not applicable as no shares were issued as consideration for the project.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitment is specified as a monetary value, not in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The joint venture has a total exploration commitment of US$10,000,000. As a 50% partner, Global Uranium's share is US$5,000,000. "The Buyer shall expend a minimum of US$10,000,000 in exploration and development costs by the three-year anniversary of Closing." and "As part of the JV, Global Uranium and Snow Lake are each responsible for providing 50% of the Consideration and future exploration expenditures."

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The seller retains a variable Net Smelter Royalty. The value is the maximum of the specified range. "The Buyer shall pay the Seller a production royalty based on an applicable royalty percentage (which will be calculated by a Net Smelter Returns variable between 3.5% and 6%, dependent on U3O8 Realized Price)...".

coverage_area_raw.justification: The total area is the sum of the mineral interests detailed in the JORC table: 3,584 hectares (Private) + 4,213 hectares (Federal) + 289 hectares (State) = 8,086 hectares. "Acreage of mineral interest controlled by each method: o Private Minerals 8,856 acres/3,584 hectares o Federal Minerals 10,410 acres/4,213 hectares o State Minerals 713 acres/289 hectares".

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit is specified in the JORC table breakdown of mineral interests: "Private Minerals 8,856 acres/3,584 hectares".

resource_size.justification: The documents explicitly state that no JORC compliant Mineral Resource has been estimated. "Insufficient modern exploration has been conducted to estimate a JORC compliant Mineral Resource and it is uncertain whether future exploration will lead to the estimation of a Mineral Resource in the defined areas." The JORC Table Section 3 also repeatedly states, "No Mineral Resources are reported on the Project."

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are provided in the document: "Global Uranium and Enrichment Limited (ASX: GUE, OTCQB: GUELF)".
